::Greven::

Greven frowns at the transmission, looking from the Energonian 
shuttle to the other Predacon shuttles in space. He transmits a short 
reply to Ominous:

"We might in a sec if some Pred shuttle doesn't pick us up," he 
replies, looking around to see if any Predacon shuttles were heading 
his way.



--- In nbwrpg@y..., JP3884@a... wrote:
>        The Energonian shuttle began its return back to base when it 
spotted 
> the distress signal sent out by Greven and Demise. Ominous decided 
to take 
> the oppertunity.
>        "This is Ominous Prime of the Energonian Forces. Do you need 
some 
> assistance?"
